# Regression with 5 Factors
```{r}
# data for regression 
EFA_with_score <- cbind.data.frame(vars[,2], EFA.scores) %>%
  dplyr::rename(., mvliking = "vars[, 2]" )


EFA_model <- lm(mvliking ~ PA1 + PA2  +PA3+PA4 +PA5, 
                data=EFA_with_score )

summary(EFA_model)

# merge with all previous data
#EFA_merge_data <- cbind(microvan, EFA.scores)
#head(EFA_merge_data)
```

